title: When did the Poros change?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
The new ones are genuinely terrifying...
_(and look like they left 70% of their IQ behind too)
_

When and why did they change?

replies.body:
They just changed poros this patch. They used to look like 
http://core0.staticworld.net/images/article/2015/09/poro-100611694-orig.png
ah ok, i dont think i like the new ones.
I dont think anyone does, hope they change it back to what i linked. Those were already good and lovable furry bags of goodness
